General.Name: PROEN Corp Public Company Limited
General.Description: PROEN Corp Public Company Limited distributes IT equipment in Thailand. It is also involved in the provision of internet data center and related services, and internet security services, as well as engages in the construction business. The company was formerly known as Proimage Engineering and Communication Company Limited. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand.

1.Name: Mr. Nititorn  Deeumpai
1.Title: CFO and VP of Strategy & Bus. Devel.
